text: Nick Kocher accidentally grabbed the wrong garment bag after his flight to L. A. from New York, resulting in a mad scramble on social media to rectify the fashion emergency. Saturday Night Live writer Nick Kocher turned to the internet on Emmys weekend for help with a fashion emergency. After landing at LAX from New York's JFK on a Delta flight on Sept. 15, Kocher realized that he had grabbed the wrong garment bag. Instead of his own — containing a navy Calvin Klein tuxedo that he looked ` ` fresh as fuck in'' — Kocher was holding someone else's, so he posted a lengthy plea on Twitter to his 15, 000 followers detailing the dire situation. ` ` Whoever has my bag is also going to the Emmys, because I have their bag
